title: Crowdsale calculation of tokens are backwards (multiplying when should be dividing)
body:
## üéâ Description


https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/zeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/crowdsale/Crowdsale.sol#L148-L150

And here

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/zeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/crowdsale/price/IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#L47-L50

Example calculation:
Apple = $2 (rate)
I pay you $100 (wei)
I get 50 Apples

Apples = Pay / Rate
50 = 100 / 2

Also may suggest for users to take into account that they'll need to multiply this calculated token amount by something along the lines of `10 ** token.decimals()`
